meanings.definition: A person or company that refines something, especially metals or oil.
meanings.sent1: The refiners worked hard to purify the gold.
meanings.sent2: The oil refiners improved the quality of the crude oil.
meanings.sent3: The refiners had a competition to see who could refine the most metal in a day.
meanings.sent4: She was a refiner of talent, always bringing out the best in her students.
meanings.sent5: The refiners' workshop hummed with the sound of machinery and the smell of metal.

meanings.definition: A group of people who refine something together.
meanings.sent1: The team of refiners collaborated to perfect the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The refiners gathered every weekend to work on their craft.
meanings.sent3: The refiners' club had a potluck dinner to celebrate their successful projects.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was a refining fire, making each member better.
meanings.sent5: The refiners shared tips and tricks to enhance their skills.
